text: Goodnight mi amor, sweet dreams and rest well! You will have a lot of time to sleep ğŸ˜´ you are the best girlfriend in the world, honey. I don't know what I did to deserve you but I'm glad I have you in my life. I will start using the app to help me improve my Spanish, I promise I will put a greater effort. I need to speak Spanish!!! It's a requirement, not an option.
